description:
Zzz
In the middle of summer, the Kamohara family has decided to go to a huge pool. The night before, Bunji and Fumi are looking forward to it and are unable to sleep...
Tired
Mom and her family got to the pool. But Mom was not able to get into the beauty salon because it was full and Dad lost sight of Bunji and Fumi...
Float, Float
Bunji and Fumi got to the children`s water slide. When Bunji falls down with a splash, his suit got stuck in between his butt, and it became a T-back. People around him got a big laugh. When Dad saw that, he got worried about Fumi.
Chilly
When Dad won the battle of rock paper scissors over who gets to drive home, he gets to drink lots of beer. On the other hand, Mom, who lost the battle and has to drive, had to bear it. And the time came when she had to drive...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ウトウト / ヘトヘト / プカプカ / ヒヤヒヤ
